nodes.bodyText:
I think the 2nd param to this method is the default value if none is set. If they've previously set a value here, they'll get that value, which I assume we won't want for big sur.
I'd suggest just changing the start of this method to something like if (SystemInfo.isMacOSBigSur) return false;
I don't think we'll need to change the behavior of the setEnableEmbeddedBrowsers() w/ the change to isEnableEmbeddedBrowsers() I suggested above.
I thought the setting would show up as checked but disabled, but it's always empty if disabled.

Perhaps also (conditionally on if we're on big sur):
myEnableEmbeddedBrowsersCheckBox.setToolTipText("This option not available...");
Oh I didn't realize you could set the tool tip here! Thanks
